001package net.tvburger.jdl.datasets;
002
003import java.io.*;
004import java.nio.file.Path;
005import java.util.ArrayList;
006import java.util.List;
007
008public final class MnistReader {
009
010    public static final int MAGIC_LABELS = 2049; // >II
011    public static final int MAGIC_IMAGES = 2051; // >IIII
012
013    public static class MnistData {
014        public final List<int[]> images; // each length = rows*cols
015        public final byte[] labels;      // unsigned values 0..9
016        public final int rows;
017        public final int cols;
018
019        public MnistData(List<int[]> images, byte[] labels, int rows, int cols) {
020            this.images = images;
021            this.labels = labels;
022            this.rows = rows;
023            this.cols = cols;
024        }
025    }
026
027    public static MnistData readImagesLabels(Path imagesPath, Path labelsPath) throws IOException {
028        // ---- Read labels ----
029        final int labelCount;
030        final byte[] labels;
031        try (DataInputStream in = new DataInputStream(new BufferedInputStream(new FileInputStream(labelsPath.toFile())))) {
032            int magic = in.readInt(); // big-endian by default
033            if (magic != MAGIC_LABELS) {
034                throw new IOException("Magic number mismatch for labels: expected " + MAGIC_LABELS + ", got " + magic);
035            }
036            labelCount = in.readInt();
037            labels = in.readNBytes(labelCount);
038            if (labels.length != labelCount) {
039                throw new EOFException("Labels file truncated: expected " + labelCount + " bytes, got " + labels.length);
040            }
041        }
042
043        // ---- Read images ----
044        final int imageCount, rows, cols;
045        final byte[] imageBytes;
046        try (DataInputStream in = new DataInputStream(new BufferedInputStream(new FileInputStream(imagesPath.toFile())))) {
047            int magic = in.readInt();
048            if (magic != MAGIC_IMAGES) {
049                throw new IOException("Magic number mismatch for images: expected " + MAGIC_IMAGES + ", got " + magic);
050            }
051            imageCount = in.readInt();
052            rows = in.readInt();
053            cols = in.readInt();
054            long total = (long) imageCount * rows * cols;
055            if (total > Integer.MAX_VALUE) {
056                throw new IllegalArgumentException("Image data too large: " + total + " bytes");
057            }
058            imageBytes = in.readNBytes((int) total);
059            if (imageBytes.length != total) {
060                throw new EOFException("Images file truncated: expected " + total + " bytes, got " + imageBytes.length);
061            }
062        }
063
064        if (imageCount != labelCount) {
065            throw new IOException("Count mismatch: images=" + imageCount + ", labels=" + labelCount);
066        }
067
068        // ---- Convert to int[] per image (0..255) ----
069        List<int[]> images = new ArrayList<>(imageCount);
070        final int pixelsPerImage = rows * cols;
071        for (int i = 0; i < imageCount; i++) {
072            int[] img = new int[pixelsPerImage];
073            int base = i * pixelsPerImage;
074            for (int p = 0; p < pixelsPerImage; p++) {
075                // Convert signed byte to unsigned int 0..255
076                img[p] = imageBytes[base + p] & 0xFF;
077            }
078            images.add(img);
079        }
080
081        return new MnistData(images, labels, rows, cols);
082    }
083}
